Message.Title: 18-Jul-13 Earnings announcement
Message.Msg: Earnings are after the bell on Thursday. Friday is monthly July option expiration. IF You have already put $120+ a share in your pocket then the afternoon just before closing you can buy some cheap July calls...cheap because they expire and probably Wall Street takes this down one more time before that event

Message.Title: This is my bottom line suggestion
Message.Msg: Hold this stock but put triple digits in your pocket per share by selling either the Jan 2015 $900 calls or above. GOOG may run to $1000 on it's own but IF you pocket $100+ a share Wall Street is less likely to play their games. Two years ago, I said this with AAPL for the Jan 2013 then 2014 $600 calls then the Jan 2014 $520 calls ....Unfortunately, I was correct

Topic.Title: This is my bottom line suggestion

Message.Msg: I will refer to this post in the future to advise how to walk the trade UP or DOWN. Signing off...

Message.Title: on May 20 it hit $920.60
Message.Msg: I believe that was the 52 week high. Good Luck but the head wind id the option players

I also trade options (outrights only) How true about the bird in the hand. I.could have had a great week if I wouldn't have greed get in the way of better judgement. Staying in for the extra point always seems to cost me two:)

Message.Title: VCSY grated Emily(XML) patent - application 09/888,329
Message.Msg: The end of the Microsoft Windows Phone commercial with the skydivers was " very interesting" "Hey is cool if I date Emily when you're......(other skydivers parachute opens-VCSY LIVES!).........Never mind! Coincidentally VCSY also claims that EVERY Samsung and LG mobile device that uses android infringes the VCSY 6,826,744 and 7,716,629 patents.
